pages.text: The first way you'll be getting food is by hunting animals. Your knife will work fine, but for bigger things, you may want to knap a $(item)javelin$(), your basic ranged weapon.
Fire it the same way you would a trident or bow.
$(thing)Hunting animals$() aren't available to breed, and are only useful for what they drop on death. They also respawn, meaning they're considered the best to hunt.

pages.name: Deer
pages.text: The deer will drop a good amount of meat, and it's a peaceful creature that won't fight back.

pages.name: Pheasant
pages.text: The pheasant doesn't drop much meat, but it'll give you feathers to make arrows.

pages.name: Hare
pages.text: A hare is a kind of rabbit.

pages.name: Mongoose
pages.text: It's like a cat, but more ugly.
